name: Elegant White Kundan Rakhi & Bracelet Set
description: A beautiful set featuring a Rakhi with white and pink beads and a central kundan design, paired with a matching gold-toned adjustable bracelet adorned with kundan work and pearls, set against a dark background.

name: Green Meenakari Rakhi & Bracelet Duo
description: A vibrant green and white Rakhi with a delicate meenakari heart-shaped centerpiece, complemented by an adjustable gold-toned bracelet with a matching green meenakari design and subtle pearl accents.

name: Peacock Eye Rakhi & Bracelet Set
description: A striking set showcasing a Rakhi with blue and green threads and a white and blue peacock eye motif, accompanied by a gold-toned adjustable bracelet featuring a similar peacock eye design, green and blue beads, and pearls.

name: Square Peacock Rakhi & Adjustable Bracelet
description: A unique Rakhi with a square peacock eye design on a light blue thread, perfectly matched with an adjustable gold-toned bracelet adorned with colorful beads, a peacock eye motif, and dangling pearls.

name: Blue and Pink Enamel Rakhi & Bracelet Pair
description: A charming Rakhi with light blue and white threads, featuring a round centerpiece with blue and pink enamel work, alongside a gold-toned adjustable bracelet with a coordinating enamel design, white beads, and pearl drops.

name: Red Triangular Kundan Rakhi Set
description: A traditional Rakhi with red and white threads, featuring a prominent red triangular kundan centerpiece, and a second strand with red beads and a matching kundan triangle, both adorned with small white pearls.

name: Ruby Red Drop & Crescent Rakhi Bracelet Set
description: An exquisite set featuring a deep pink Rakhi with a central red drop-shaped kundan element and pearls, paired with a gold-toned adjustable bracelet adorned with matching red kundan drops, crescent moon designs, and pearl clusters.

name: Royal Blue Triangular Rakhi & Bracelet
description: A striking set with an orange and blue Rakhi featuring a triangular blue and gold meenakari design, accompanied by a complementary bracelet with blue beads and a similar triangular motif, finished with white pearls.

name: Green Kundan Rakhi & Pearl Bracelet Combo
description: A elegant set including a green and white Rakhi with a green kundan centerpiece and pearls, alongside a beautiful multi-strand white pearl bracelet featuring a matching green kundan and bead embellishment.

name: Orange Thread Kundan Rakhi & Bracelet Set
description: A warm-toned set featuring an orange thread Rakhi with a round kundan design and coral beads, coordinated with a gold-toned adjustable bracelet adorned with a similar kundan centerpiece, coral beads, and pearl drops.

name: Delicate Pink & White Rakhi Bracelet Set
description: A charming set featuring a Rakhi with pink and white threads, adorned with a central circular kundan design and pink and white beads, complemented by a gold-toned adjustable bracelet with a matching kundan motif and pearl drops.

name: Mint Green Lotus Rakhi & Pearl Bracelet
description: A serene Rakhi with green and white threads, showcasing a mint green lotus charm, paired with a multi-strand white pearl bracelet featuring a similar lotus design surrounded by clustered pearls.

name: Vibrant Green & Red Rakhi Bracelet Set
description: A festive set featuring a Rakhi with pink and white threads and a central green and red enamel design, matched with a white beaded bracelet adorned with a coordinating green and red motif and green faceted beads.

name: Red Lotus Rakhi & White Pearl Bracelet
description: A captivating set displaying a Rakhi with green and red threads, highlighted by a prominent red lotus charm, accompanied by a multi-strand white pearl bracelet with a similar red lotus design and hanging pearl and red bead clusters.

name: Sky Blue Kundan Rakhi & Adjustable Bracelet
description: A elegant set featuring a light blue thread Rakhi with a central circular kundan design and blue beads, paired with a gold-toned adjustable bracelet adorned with multiple kundan elements and delicate pearl drops.

name: Evil Eye & Infinity Symbol Rakhi Set
description: A unique collection including a blue thread Rakhi with an evil eye and infinity symbol, a minimalist gold-toned mangalsutra chain with an infinity charm, and a matching gold and black beaded bracelet with an infinity design.

name: Yellow Lotus Rakhi & Pearl Bracelet
description: A bright set featuring a Rakhi with orange and green threads, showcasing a prominent yellow lotus charm with green accents, complemented by a multi-strand white pearl bracelet with a matching yellow lotus design and pearl clusters.

name: Royal Blue Lotus Rakhi & Pearl Bracelet
description: A regal set featuring a Rakhi with blue and white threads, highlighted by a stunning blue and green lotus charm, accompanied by a multi-strand white pearl bracelet with a similar lotus design and hanging pearl drops.

name: Aqua Green Lotus Rakhi & White Beaded Bracelet
description: A refreshing set including an aqua blue thread Rakhi with a light green lotus charm and green and blue beads, paired with a multi-strand white beaded bracelet featuring a coordinating lotus design and dangling pearls.

name: Red Enamel & Pearl Rakhi Bracelet Combo
description: A beautiful set featuring a red and white Rakhi with a central red enamel and kundan design, accompanied by a multi-strand white beaded bracelet with a matching red enamel motif, pearls, and red accents.

name: Festive Tassel Rakhi & Bracelet Set
description: A vibrant Rakhi with yellow and green threads adorned with colorful beads and a small circular embellishment, paired with a matching white beaded bracelet featuring a striking multi-colored peacock-inspired charm with dangling pearl and bead tassels in green, pink, and yellow hues.

name: Evil Eye Protection Jewelry Set
description: A coordinated set featuring a light blue thread Rakhi with an evil eye charm, a gold-toned necklace with a central evil eye pendant, and a black beaded gold-toned bracelet with a matching evil eye design, all against a dark background.

name: Blue Enamel Rakhi & Pearl Bracelet Duo
description: A stylish set including a blue and white thread Rakhi with a central blue and red enamel kundan design and pearls, accompanied by a white beaded bracelet with a similar blue enamel motif, kundan stones, and clusters of small pearls.
